verbs.description: [V: According] to EPA employees , Scott Pruitt and the Trump administration are reorganizing the EPA to promote regulated industries , at the expense of its official mission to " protect human health and the environment . " Pruitt 's proposals would delay or block at least 30 rules beneficial to public health .

According to EPA employees , Scott Pruitt and the Trump administration [V: are] reorganizing the EPA to promote regulated industries , at the expense of its official mission to " protect human health and the environment . " Pruitt 's proposals would delay or block at least 30 rules beneficial to public health .
